item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World I’ve finally done it. I’ve taken the time to learn enough about web development to set up my own blog. I may tweak the styling a little in the future, but I think the bare bones look will never really be out of date. I’m using hugo to build this site. It may seem a little overkill for something so simple, but I find it quite easy to use despite its power, and it allows me to compose these posts in markdown.
